system.description:
At 9th level you’ve mastered and branched out from basic chemistry, discovering a new science to integrate into your tactics. You may add your Intelligence modifier to the saving throw DC of any item you create using @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.7xAFxEiAelBJXmWi]{Tactical Chemistry}. In addition, choose one of the following:

Humanoid Biochemistry

You’ve learned a great deal of biochemistry and what chemicals you can apply to alleviate many ailments. You can create the following additional items using your Tactical Chemistry feature:

@UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-adventuring-gear.Item.vzy6r3gv8ylwoim7]{Antitoxin}

@UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-adventuring-gear.Item.nees9nzonritxzwe]{Healing Potion (Greater)}

@UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-adventuring-gear.Item.x9t8xc1kffdnm5nz]{Laudanum}

Toxin Synthesis

You’ve learned the subtleties of toxins and can now rapidly produce foul and deadly substances. You can create the following additional items using your Tactical Chemistry feature:

@UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-adventuring-gear.Item.b368613h5uld90d3]{Curare (Vial)}

@UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-adventuring-gear.Item.svwd5a8s1rr1dm90]{Poison, Potent (Vial)}
